seo.title: Choise.com Support | let us help you
seo.description: Please answer a few questions so we can help you better with your problem or request

step0.title: let us help you
step0.description: Please answer a few questions so we can help you better with your problem or request

step1.title: on which platform do you use Choise.com?

step2.title: please select the type of your request

step3.title: please select the sub-type of your request

step4.title: describe your problem or request
step4.description: we will help faster if know more

messege.case2: Please describe your problem including the summ, currency and date of transaction
messege.case5: Please describe your problem including the summ, currency and date of transaction
messege.case4: Please describe your problem and add a transaction link

step5.title: leave details of your account
step5.description: phone number registered in the Crypterium App & contact email

step_final.title: thank you
step_final.description:
Your request has been recieved.
We will answer you in 24 hours or sooner
